ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Singing Steel missing pieces
ygData.msgSnippet: Gate would be a nice effect to drop off a level 20 mob.  It does drop off level 35ish mobs (the cenobite? in CT? And PoF mobs too drop a wand with a gate.) And
ygData.messageBody:
Gate would be a nice effect to drop off a level 20 mob. It does drop off
level 35ish mobs (the cenobite? in CT? And PoF mobs too drop a wand with a
gate.) And they need to make Shaman potions reasonable - to make and to buy.
But its a low level spell.

At high levels, folks do not use gate as a "get out of jail free card." Not
if they ever want to get invited to plane/dragon/dungeon again. The stuff
you do is group oriented. Druids and Wizards transport folks - before and
after. You wont be hurting for transport if you are playing with guild
groups. And a gate to your bind point is merely a very occasional
convenience. Gate without bind - is ridiculous.

Something good would be a heal or buff. A real heal or a good buff even if
it used reagents.

Sylly

p.s. I'd take summon bandages over gate

p.s.s. Sorry, Gordon or GZ might hear that!

----- Original Message -----
From: "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 13, 2000 10:13 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Singing Steel missing pieces


> Too bad the rumour that all the melee and hybrid BP's had Gate, I was
> looking forward to that.
